size.description: Use the size prop to change the size of the label and the form element.
size.description_zh: Use the size prop to change the size of the label and the form element.

error.description: Use the error prop to display an error message below the form element.
error.description_zh: Use the error prop to display an error message below the form element.

help.description: Use the help prop to display an help message below the form element.
help.description_zh: Use the help prop to display an help message below the form element.

description.description: Use the description prop to display a description below the label.
description.description_zh: Use the description prop to display a description below the label.

hint.description: Use the hint prop to display a hint above the form element.
hint.description_zh: Use the hint prop to display a hint above the form element.

required.description: Use the required prop to indicate that the form element is required.
required.description_zh: Use the required prop to indicate that the form element is required.
